DescriptionExternalHTML:
Khalifa University is a leading academic institution dedicated to providing world-class education, research, and innovation. The Department of Computer Science within the College of Computing and Mathematical Sciences at Khalifa University covers a wide array of fields including information systems, computer and information security, software engineering, Internet of Things, embedded systems, computer vision, artificial intelligence, among others. The department provides Bachelor of Science degrees in Computer Science and M.Sc. and Ph.D. programs in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science.

 

The department invites applications for one position from highly motivated and experienced candidates to join our team as Lab Engineer in Computer Science. The successful candidate will help deliver labs for undergraduate courses for our Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science. Labs expected to be delivered include, but are not limited to: Python Programming Language, Object-Oriented Programming (with Java), Operating Systems, Software Engineering and an introductory course in Data Science/AI. Competitive remuneration and comprehensive employment benefits are offered.
